questions.question: Why does LI-RADS not apply to patients without risk factors, under 18 years old, or with cirrhosis due to congenital hepatic fibrosis?
questions.challenge: Tests ability to extract rationale behind exclusion criteria

questions.question: Why does LI-RADS exclude patients with cirrhosis caused by vascular disorders such as Budd-Chiari syndrome or chronic portal vein occlusion?
questions.challenge: Tests citation and comprehension of imaging mimicry

questions.question: If cirrhosis is uncertain, how should CT/MRI LI-RADS be applied?
expected_content: if the patient has cirrhosis or hepatitis B
questions.challenge: Tests whether model can interpret conditional medical guidance

questions.question: Can transplant centers required to use the OPTN system still apply LI-RADS?
questions.challenge: Tests comprehension of regulatory overlap between LI-RADS and OPTN

questions.question: How should LI-RADS be applied in patients with active extrahepatic primary malignancy?
expected_content: categorize as LR-M if in doubt
questions.challenge: Tests nuanced interpretation under overlapping disease contexts

questions.question: Why does LI-RADS not apply to single-phase CT or MRI examinations?
questions.challenge: Tests if model can identify technical imaging limitation

questions.question: How should radiologists report findings when only single-phase imaging is available?
What factors were compared in the study assessing prostate MRI image quality at 1.5T versus 3T field strengths?
questions.challenge: Tests multi-page reasoning over comparative data

questions.question: According to Baur et al., what was the reported p-value for T2-weighted image quality differences between ERC-PAC and PAC-only setups?
questions.challenge: Tests retrieval of exact numerical values from statistical text

questions.question: What are the main reasons why endorectal coil (ERC) improves prostate MRI image quality at 1.5T?
questions.challenge: Tests understanding of physical principles behind coil use

questions.question: With the advent of 3T MRI scanners, what question arose regarding the continued necessity of endorectal coils?
questions.challenge: Tests contextual understanding of evolving imaging practices
